title: Link Shortener Online
description: This website offers the service of cutting links completely free, to use it correctly you only need to enter a valid existing link that begins with http or https.

form.optional-1: You can optionally get your custom shortened link, just if available
form.optional-2: To do this you must place a valid sub page, for example: hbo-max

list.question: What is Link Shortener Online?
list.answer: Link Shortener Online is a free service that allows you reduce the length of your links to make them more manageable and easy to share.

list.question: How does it work?
list.answer: You just need to paste your original link into our tool and you will get a shorter link that redirects to the original page. It's fast, simple and free.

list.question: Why should you use Link Shortener Online?
list.answer: Our service makes it easy to share long links, especially on platforms with character limits. Plus, it offers a cleaner, more professional look.

list.question: Is it really free?
list.answer: Yes, Link Shortener Online is completely free for all users. There are no hidden fees or subscriptions.

list.question: Do we accept donations?
list.answer: Yes, we accept donations to help keep our service free and improve quality. You can donate through PayPal by clicking the donate button on our page.

list.question: Can I trust the privacy of my shortened links?
list.answer: Yes, we respect the privacy of our users. We do not store personal information or share data with third parties. Your privacy is our priority.

list.question: How long will my shortened links be active?
list.answer: Shortened links are permanent unless you decide to manually remove them. However, please note that we reserve the right to remove links that violate our policies.

list.question: Do we offer click statistics?
list.answer: Currently, we do not offer click statistics. We are working to improve and add additional features in future updates.

subPageExists: The sub page already exists, try another one.
invalidSubPage: Invalid subpage, subpages can only contain letters, numbers and hyphens.
